my_favourite_bni_story: One of my favorite BNI moments was when a client referral shared how their life had changed after our sessions. Hearing about the positive impact acupuncture had on their well-being is always inspiring and reminds me why I love what I do.

my_favourite_bni_story: Seal N Shine’s BNI Success Story: Expanding into Surface Protection Film BNI isn’t just about business—it’s about collaboration, trust, and new opportunities. Through valuable connections with fellow members, Seal N Shine discovered a growing need for protecting furniture surfaces, especially marble dining tables and kitchen platforms from everyday scratches and wear. With a strong referral network, partnerships were formed, expertise was shared, and the new service was launched with confidence! This collaboration didn’t just open doors to a fresh market—it also strengthened relationships within the chapter. Working together, brainstorming solutions, and supporting each other’s businesses created friendships that go beyond BNI meetings.

name: Shiva Kanth P
category: Real Estate Services > Real Estate Services (Other)
top_product: OPEN PLOTS , VILLAS , AND PRIVATE POOL VILLAS.
top_problem_solved: Once upon a time in a town, the Yadagirigutta Temple stood tall—a symbol of hope and spirituality. When the COVID-19 pandemic hit, the construction faced a daunting challenge. Many contractors turned away from the complicated ornamental contract, fearing the risks involved. But I saw an opportunity instead of an obstacle. Driven by my passion and vision for the temple's beauty, I stepped forward. With determination, I meticulously planned and worked tirelessly, even when faced with supply chain issues and safety protocols. As weeks passed, obstacles arose, but I refused to give up. Late nights and hard work paid off when, against all odds, I completed the intricate construction ahead of schedule. The temple now sparkled with breathtaking beauty, and I became a beacon of hope for my community. My story spread, inspiring others to tackle challenges head-on. In a time of fear, I showed that courage and dedication could lead to extraordinary achievements, turning the temple into a symbol of perseverance for all who dared to dream big.
my_favourite_bni_story: Every challenge is an opportunity in disguise. Just like the NRI who explored 20 different sites before choosing my project, perseverance and dedication lead to success. Trust the journey, believe in your vision, and remember that hard work pays off. Keep pushing forward; your breakthrough is closer than you think!

name: Shubnit Mehta

We took up the Project and supplied the Best Plywood which is 100% Termite Resistant with Lifetime warranty and today 10 years later he is very happy and still recommends all his family and friends to take all their material from Interiors and More.
my_favourite_bni_story: i had recently joined BNI and was searching for a transport company to get some materials from Gujrat to Hyderabad. my vendor had spoken to a transport company who gave me a quotation which i thought was expensive. i put in a request on the whats app group to help me find aa BNI member in the transport category. Within 30-40 mins of my posting the message I got atleast 18-20 calls from different BNI Members and closed the deal the next day at less than half of the initial quotation I got earlier. That was the day i Understood the Power of Networking!!!
